title: Several Raw and Graded T206s for Sale
author: frankrizzo29

posts.post_title: Several Raw and Graded T206s for Sale
posts.post_content:
I've been working on a fun project over the past 8 months, and have accumulated a lot of low grade and raw duplicates.  Most of these I have purchased as part of "lots", which has resulted in many duplicates.  

All orders over $100 are free shipping.  $5 for all orders less than $100.  Shipping will include tracking.

I will also do discounts for multiple cards being purchased in same order.  

All prices are PayPal FF net to me.  

First "I'll take it" supersedes all on going negotiations.  Please PM or email me at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions.  

Graded Cards:

Davis PSA 2 = $70
Ganzel PSA 1.5 = $65
Schreck PSA 1.5 = $70
Sharpe PSA 1.5(MK) = $60
Seymour Throwing (Polar Bear Back) SGC 1 = $70
Congalton SGC 2 = $70
Chase Holding Trophy SGC 3 = $230
Doc White Portrait BVG 3 = $SOLD
Wallace SGC 2.5 = $225

Individual Raw Cards:

Germany Schaefer Sovereign 150 = $350
Krause Portrait = $70

Raw Card Lots:

All lots below are sold in 3 card lots.  Most of these are in rough condition, and some of them may be trimmed, and are priced accordingly.  Please see pictures for condition.  If you'd like to see a better picture please let me know.  Or, buy all 3 remaining lots for $225 total.  

Congalton - Davis - Davidson = $SOLD
Delehanty - Flanagan - Phelps = $SOLD
Thomas - White SC 350- Kisinger = $SOLD

Please see attached link for pictures.
